notFound.subtitle: Oops! Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you’re looking for doesn’t exist or may have been permanently moved.

mobileUnsupported.title: Mobile / Tablet Support Coming Soon
mobileUnsupported.description: This page is currently best viewed on a desktop or laptop. We’re working hard to make it mobile-friendly. You may use
mobileUnsupported.description2: on your mobile device for now.

about.contactText: If you have any questions, feedback or request a tool, feel free to reach out via email at: <email>yuanisha@gmail.com</email>

about.myProjectsDescription: More projects coming soon! Stay tuned for updates.
